h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
content: Robust Constitution and Rampant Vigor will give you boosts to your health and stamina respectively, helping you in those early fights. Similan Agility works well with Rampant Vigor, reducing the stamina cost of dodging, while you're already benefiting from an increase to max stamina. Being able to dodge consistently and worry less about stamina will get you out of some sticky situations.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees' and the sub-subsection 'Best Foundation Skills to Unlock'.
The content is as follows:
Robust Constitution and Rampant Vigor will give you boosts to your health and stamina respectively, helping you in those early fights. Similan Agility works well with Rampant Vigor, reducing the stamina cost of dodging, while you're already benefiting from an increase to max stamina. Being able to dodge consistently and worry less about stamina will get you out of some sticky situations.
